name: Add new incoming survey from Survey123 to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row
description:
Every time you receive a new survey, Make will automatically add selected data from the survey123 to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

This template is expecting these columns in your target Google Sheet:
1) ID
2) Object ID
3) Name
4) Phone number
5) Email address

It's OK if your spreadsheet does not have exactly matching columns. You will just map your survey response items to your columns.
